title: O Come, Let Us Sing to the Lord
author: [unclear]

verses.text:
O come, let us sing to the Lord,
Come let us every one
A joyful noise make to the Rock
Of our salvation.

Let us before His presence come
With glad and thankful
For God, above all the gods,
He did make.

For God, a great King,
A bove all the sea
To Him, and kneel
He did make.

To Him, for He
For He the sea
And kneel
Maker.

O come, bow down and worship Him,
Him, and
to
our
